member.name: SYNCMGRINVOKEFLAGS
member.summary: TheSYNCMGRINVOKEFLAGS enumeration value specifies how the Sync Manager is to be invoked in the method.

member.name: SYNCMGRINVOKEFLAGS.SYNCMGRINVOKE_STARTSYNC
member.summary: Immediately start the synchronization without displaying the Choice dialog box.

member.name: SYNCMGRINVOKEFLAGS.SYNCMGRINVOKE_MINIMIZED
member.summary: Indicates that the Choice dialog should be minimized by default.
